targetLine.text: You, sir.... truly are Mr. Incredible. You know, I was right to idolize you. I... I-I always knew you were tough, but tricking the probe by hiding under the bones of another super? Oh, man! I’m still geekin' out about it! [sighs] And then you had to just.... ruin the ride . I mean, Mr. Incredible calling for help? [mocking] Help me, help me. Help! ...lame...lame...lame, LAME, LAME!! ALL RIGHT, WHO DID YOU CONTACT?!

contextBefore.text: Easy, Helen. Easy. easy, girl. You're overreacting. Everything's fine. They're just — all getting coffee at...the same time. Yeah.

And then you had to just.... ruin the ride . I mean, Mr. Incredible calling for help?
Help me, help me. Help! ...lame...lame...lame, LAME, LAME!! ALL RIGHT, WHO DID YOU CONTACT?!
